description: The Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Low is up for the elements—all the elements. Surrounding a weather-resistant eVent™ bootie construction is everything you love about the classic Lone Peak plus the new addition of the responsive Altra EGO™ midsole. The MaxTrac™ outsole keeps you conquering rough terrain so you can enjoy high speeds with dry feet.
name: Altra Lone Peak AW Low - Mens

specs.value: Their signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet
™Their Balanced Cushioning™ platform positions your heel and forefoot at an equal distance from the ground, encouraging better alignment, better form, and a low impact landing
Their grippy MaxTrac™ outsole provides the perfect combination of grip, traction, and durability on all types of terrain
These canted lugs on the outsole are strategically placed beneath the metatarsals to provide added traction underfoot
